+    void resolve_ref(git_repository *repo,

+                     const char *refname) {
+        git_reference *ref;
+        const git_oid *oid;
+        git_oid tmp;
+        smart_object<git_object> obj;
+        if (git_oid_fromstr(&tmp, refname) == GIT_SUCCESS) {
+            git_object_lookup(obj, repo, &tmp, GIT_OBJ_ANY);
+        } else {

+        }

+            git_tag_target(out, obj);
+        } else {
+            out = obj.release();
+        }
